info.author: UNKNOWN
info.description:
js.flat_ui |Build Status|_
**************************

.. |Build Status| image:: https://travis-ci.org/MiCHiLU/js.flat_ui.png
.. _`Build Status`: http://travis-ci.org/MiCHiLU/js.flat_ui

Introduction
============

This library packages `Flat-UI`_ for `fanstatic`_.

.. _`fanstatic`: http://fanstatic.org
.. _`Flat-UI`: http://designmodo.github.io/Flat-UI/

This requires integration between your web framework and ``fanstatic``,
and making sure that the original resources (shipped in the ``resources``
directory in ``js.flat_ui``) are published to some URL.


How to use?
===========


You can import ``flat_ui`` from ``js.flat_ui`` and ``need`` it where you want
these resources to be included on a page::

  >>> from js.flat_ui import flat_ui
  >>> flat_ui.need()

  >>> from js.flat_ui import (
  ...     flat_ui,
  ... )
info.name: js.flat_ui
info.html_description:
Introduction

This library packages Flat-UI for fanstatic.

This requires integration between your web framework and fanstatic, and making sure that the original resources (shipped in the resources directory in js.flat_ui) are published to some URL.

How to use?

You can import flat_ui from js.flat_ui and need it where you want these resources to be included on a page:

>>> from js.flat_ui import flat_ui
>>> flat_ui.need()

>>> from js.flat_ui import (
...     flat_ui,
... )
